value.title: Unpacking The Best Top Ten Quotes About Artificial Intelligence Leveraging Modern-Day AI Ethics Thinking
value.excerpt: This is a carefully devised set of Top Ten quotes about AI, providing an explanation about each quote and illuminating key insights about the future of AI, doing so with a keen eye toward the latest in AI Ethics thinking.

value.title: Why Do We Keep Repeating The Same Mistakes On AI?
value.excerpt: Artificial intelligence has been on the horizon for over seventy years. Why does it seem so close but also so unattainable? Are we repeating the same mistakes over and over?

value.title: Self-driving tech company floats possible sale to Apple or Microsoft

value.title: Artificial intelligence can be used to better monitor Maine's forests
value.excerpt: Researchers have developed a novel method of using artificial intelligence and machine learning to make monitoring soil moisture more energy and cost efficient. The software learns over time how to make the best use of available network resources,

value.title: How artificial intelligence can explain its decisions
value.excerpt: Artificial intelligence (AI) can be trained to recognize whether a tissue image contains a tumor. However, exactly how it makes its decision has remained a mystery until now. A team from the Research Center for Protein Diagnostics (PRODI) at Ruhr-Universität Bochum is developing a new approach that will render an AI's decision transparent and thus trustworthy.

value.title: GM's Cruise recalls, revises self-driving software after crash
value.excerpt: General Motors startup unit Cruise LLC said Thursday it had recalled 80 self-driving vehicles and updated their software after a June crash in San Francisco left two people injured.

value.title: Bill targeting Tesla's 'self-driving' claims passes California Legislature
value.excerpt: Tired of waiting for the DMV to act on what they see as a serious matter of public safety, California lawmakers took the matter into their own hands.
